text: When dealing with the iFrame Modals, is there a reason why the src is called when it opens and AGAIN when it closes? Or anyway for there to be on the called src side to know which is which, open or close on request?
I will answer my own question and then pose more..

So that notes that there is a second update to make sure the most up to date data is being shared from one point to the other.
I am fine with that.

I guess the resulting measures required to note which is open and which is close... would be to set a flag in the private app.
Flag on, open iframe, Flag off?
Wont this just pass the flag on option every time, even on the close request?
Doesn't really make sense that the close would need an updated request sent I guess is my initial reaction.
